system.requirements:
Tier 2: Psy Rating, Willpower 45, Forbidden Lore (Daemonology)
Aptitudes: Psyker, Willpower
system.effect: When character makes a Focus Power Test and the target of the psychic power is a Daemon, they gain +10 to the Test. At GM Discretion this can apply to other tests such as Rituals to summon or bind a Daemon.

description.value: When character makes a Focus Power Test and the target of the psychic power is a Daemon, they gain +10 to the Test. At GM Discretion this can apply to other tests such as Rituals to summon or bind a Daemon.
